root.name: Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army
root.description: OverviewSniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army is a stand alone expansion in the Sniper Elite series and is developed and published by Rebellion.In this 1-4 player co-op campaign, a desperate Adolf Hitler has unleashed a legion of undead super soldiers that threaten to take over Europe. Step up Karl Fairburne, one of the few living souls left in Germany, and his band of merry snipers. Their mission: to destroy Hitler's Nazi Zombie Army!System RequirementsOS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista (SP 2) or Windows® 7 or Windows® 8Processor: Dual-core CPU with SSE3 (Intel® Pentium® D 3GHz / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 4200) or betterMemory: 2GBHard Disk Space: 5GB of free drive spaceVideo Card: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible graphics card with 256 MB of memory (NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 series / ATI Radeon™ HD 3870) or betterSound: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible sound card or betterDirectX: Microsoft® DirectX® 11.0
